mapper.sql: t_house_property_building_unit.id , t_house_property_building_unit.building_id AS buildingId, t_house_property_building_unit.number, t_house_property_building_unit.house_type AS houseType, t_house_property_building_unit.house_type_picture AS houseTypePicture, t_house_property_building_unit.area
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_property_building_unit.* FROM t_house_property_building_unit WHERE t_house_property_building_unit.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_property_building_unit
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_property_building_unit.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.building_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.buildingId},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.number},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.house_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.houseType},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.house_type_picture LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.houseTypePicture},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.area},'%')
AND t_house_property_building_unit.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_property_building_unit.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}

SELECT * FROM t_house_property_building_unit JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id = t_house_property_building.id And t_house_property_building.community_id = #{communityId} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.house_type

SELECT t_house_property_building.* FROM t_house_property_building_unit JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building.id=t_house_property_building_unit.building_id AND t_house_property_building_unit.house_type=#{houseType} AND t_house_property_building.community_id = #{communityId} GROUP BY t_house_property_building.id
